mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_ID, ITEM_ID, MEMBER_ID, AMOUNT, STATE, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.ITEM_ID, O.MEMBER_ID, O.AMOUNT, S.STATE, S.REG_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ORDERS O JOIN ( SELECT ORDER_ID, MAX(STATE) AS STATE, MAX(REG_DATE) AS REG_DATE FROM ORDER_STATES WHERE STATE > 0 GROUP BY ORDER_ID ) S ON O.ORDER_ID = S.ORDER_ID ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.ITEM_ID, O.MEMBER_ID, O.AMOUNT, OS.STATE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_STATES OS ON O.ORDER_ID = OS.ORDER_ID) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

select D.STATE, NVL(Q.AMOUNT, 0) AS AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM STATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= 8 AND ROWNUM >= 1 ) D left JOIN ( SELECT STATE, COUNT(STATE) AS AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT MAX(STATE) AS STATE FROM ORDER_STATES GROUP BY ORDER_ID ) GROUP BY STATE ORDER BY STATE ) Q on Q.STATE = D.STATE order by D.STATE
